amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-679 to end eligibility for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program for convicted violent rapists, pedophiles and murderers after enactment into law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holding amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Holding.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Holding amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
